message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This extraordinary item holds immense value and is worth $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration, we are offering it to you at an exceptional price of $1,150,000. We believe this offer presents a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a price that is highly competitive yet ensures you receive a significant return on your investment. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
